hero.title: Hello!
hero.description_2: year-old designer and developer in my third year of a design bachelor's degree at UiO. Right now, I'm on exchange at Korea University in Seoul! üåè

1.title: Polaris Page Overview
1.subtitle: For Polaris Media S√∏r (Summer 2024)
1.imgAlt: Image of Polaris page overview landing page
1.description: Took the initiative to upgrade the company's coordination program from a shared Excel sheet to a MongoDB, ExpressJS, React, and NodeJS based web app. The frontend is built using Tailwind, Shadcn, and TypeScript.

2.title: Demo for Carbon Trading Platform
2.subtitle: For climate startup, Clear Karbon Exchange (Spring 2024)
2.description: Developed a prototype for the service in React, with a MongoDB/NodeJS/ExpressJS backend. The goal was to create a demo of the service to present to potential investors. Worked closely with another intern and had daily stand-up meetings.
2.imgAlt: Image of landing page for climate demo

3.title: Android App Development
3.subtitle: For IN2000 at UiO. (Spring 2024)
3.description: Designed and developed an A-grade Android app together with 5 other students. Became proficient in app development using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. We also followed scrum and kanban practices as much as we could. Conducted several interviews with veterinarians as data collection for the interview process. My main tasks were programming and UX/UI.
